Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-10600K CPU @ 4.10GHz 4.30 GHz | GPU: Nvidia RTX 3060 12GB | RAM: 32GB

 

After decoupling, the part that was decoupled disassembled  into each pieces. They seemed to be movement synced (Might've had the same speed) *Watch the screenshots, it's hard to explain*
Thank you!

 

Included Attachments:

Edited July 8, 2023 by Anth12

Seeing similar behaviour in  v0.1.3.1, I have a space station with several parts, when I decouple on one side of the decoupler all the parts just stop being attached to each-other.
But! Thrusters still react to controls (can be fun.. ), so I guess they're not really separate parts, but more lost physical connection.
